ygData.subject: reaction order
ygData.msgSnippet: Professor, is it possible to use not the stoichometric coefficients as species- reaction order but another value? e.g. Species: A B Reaction:  1 A - 1 B Rate

Professor,

is it possible to use not the stoichometric coefficients as species-
reaction order but another value? 

e.g. 
Species: A B
Reaction:  1 A -> 1 B
Rate of change of Species A: dC(A)/dt=-k*C(A)^x

Normally x is set to the stoichometric coefficient (1 in this 
example), can I change this to an arbitrary number?

best regards
Ulf Senechal
